text: The 2010 Dow Corning Tennis Classic – Singles was held in Midland, Michigan, USA. Third seed Elena Baltacha defeated the top seed Lucie Hradecká in the finals to win the first edition of the Dow Corning Tennis Classic as a 100K tournament. ==Seeds== == Draw == === Finals === === Top half === ===Bottom half=== ==See also== *2010 Dow Corning Tennis Classic - Doubles ==References== * Singles draw Category:Dow Corning Tennis Classic Dow Corning Tennis Classic Category:2010 in sports in Michigan Category:2010 in American tennis
title: 2010 Dow Corning Tennis Classic – Singles
